tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am Vinod Raj, consulting  Dr Pradeep Kiran B S, for the last 3 years. He has been very nice to me always and has guided me well, while he explains my state of being after each course of treatment. I am satisfied with the obtained results. The management is doing their best in the service. I am happy with the overall experience.
Doctor is very much experienced, listen's to the problem very carefully and suggests better ways of treatment. 
Now I am recommending my friends for Osteoarthritis, Sports injury, Osteoporosis, Bone and Joint health and Gynecology { Dr Bhargavi V, Rhea Fertility & Women Care Center} treatment / consultation we are visiting RHEA health care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is very much caring, shown concern about the problem which I had explained. He is an expert in orthopaedic  and sports medicine.  Normally majority of the doctors recommend for surgery how Dr Pradeep will give remedy without surgery that's the specialty about him. He recognise his patients and give a good treatment. 

People are recommended to take benefits of his medication techniques and be healthy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've known Dr Pradeep Kiran since 2009. I was operated for ACL reconstruction by Dr Pradeep and overal experience was very good. Post operation recovery was very fast, thanks to Dr Pradeep and his team. As a doctor, he instills lot of confidence and explains the problem and it's solution in a very simple way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very patient, motivating, concerned about the well being of patients, allows patients to decide their time lines, has a smiling face and a postive attitude. Money is never his first priority and he advices patients based on the real requirement. Clinic located in an easily accessible place on the main road. Cleanliness is maintained and Corona related safety measures are followed well by the doctorc and the staff.

Over all felt very happy meeting doctor n his advise.
